body:
Hi everybody, I've just completed the OrientationStudy's definition.. but as soon as I've connected the OrientationStudy component to the Radiation Analysis, it happened this: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/pUv0rT5h6PI2nwYDTspHH54Q71dHtrFHZQhqWp4JJQXAQaj1GU6*08FXvrUiDS4UQPz1c3a2eMULOBAKR1yplxGkDa-a1o-J/Schermata20150304alle16.43.02.png) The balloon says: "Solution exception:index out of range: 6"

I think I've used the same parameter shown on this tutorial.. so I can't understand the reason. Ideas? Thanks
